title: WATCH: Young bears let themselves in the front door of nursing home
body: ASHEVILLE, N.C. () — A group of young black bears made a special stop at an Asheville nursing home in North Carolina, even letting themselves in through the front door!Viewer Cindy Brown shared a video of bears wandering into the vestibule of Accordius Health at Asheville.At least one of the bears seems to have figured out how to operate the pull-handle door, opening the door twice between playful tussles.Brown said the visit from the furry friends brought "smiles to everyone."
